Text: It comes on top of a £31m transport investment package which was agreed by the WMCA back in June to help the city with works around Pool Meadow bus station, road and cycle improvements and new lighting in time for 2021.
Cause: help the city with works around Pool Meadow bus station, road and cycle improvements and new lighting in time for 2021.
Effect: It comes on top of a £31m transport investment package which was agreed by the WMCA back in June
